posting_body: 1 Bedroom Units: $300 Security Deposit with Approved Credit
2 Bedroom Units: $400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit
Visit This Website to See More:
Welcome Home to The Avalon Apartments
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 575 Sq.
Our community of one-, two-, and three-bedroom Denver, Colorado apartments are conveniently located for the perfect residential experience.

Residents enjoy a wide selection of local dining, shopping, and entertainment options, plus quick access to Metro State University, Rocky Mountain College of Art and Design, and other nearby colleges.
Enjoy the natural beauty of Denver, shop your heart out at the Bel Mar Mall, or grab a bite at one of Denver's amazing restaurants or pubs.
- Renovated Kitchen Modern Black Appliances* and a Convenient Gas Stove Top Range
- Get the city living you want, without the price tag!
- Multiple Beautiful Courtyards with Pavilions and Gas BBQ Grills
- On-Site Laundry Facilities with New Washer & Dryers
- On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, and On-Call Courtesy Patrol
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
